original_text: One day, we were going to the place where people prayed to God. On the way there, we met a slave girl. A bad spirit was living inside her. This spirit told her what would happen soon. People gave her masters a lot of money when she told them about these future things.
korean_text: 우리가 기도하는 곳에 가다가 점치는 귀신 들린 여종 하나를 만나니 점으로 그 주인들에게 큰 이익을 주는 자라

sentences.original_text: One day, we were going to the place
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 우리는 그곳으로 가고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: On the way there, we met a slave girl
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳으로 가는 길에, 우리는 한 여종을 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: A bad spirit was living inside her
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 영이 그녀 안에 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: This spirit told her what would happen soon
sentences.korean_translation: 이 영은 곧 일어날 일들을 그녀에게 알려주었습니다

sentences.original_text: People gave her masters a lot of money
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그녀의 주인들에게 많은 돈을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: when she told them about these future things
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 이 미래의 일들에 대해 말할 때
